ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with comicbox 1.1.1 on 2024-03-14T02:20:18 [Issue ID 4000-1772431] urn:comicvine:4000-1772431 urn:grandcomicsdatabase:issue/1772431 Tagged with ComicTagger 1.6.0a13.dev122 using info from Grand Comics Database on 2024-06-18 16:36:29. [Issue ID 1772431]
ComicInfo.Summary:
Hellina and Scythe are locked in mortal combat with Hell's Executioner as their newly-formed army falls to ash in his path! The Mad Queen has an even more horrific surprise planned for them, if they both survive! The awe-inspiring art of Gabriel Andrade is on every issue of this series, joined by writer Pat Shand, as they unleash the forces of evil for a rumble down under!
Available with a host of sexy stunning covers with this issue including a Regular & Wraparound Covers by series artist Gabriel Andrade, Bad Girl Cover and Enforcer Cover by Ron Adrian, Sacrilege Cover by Raulo Caceres, and Stunning Cover by Matt Martin. Plus an array of super limited covers for the collector including a Fetish Fashion Set (of 3 books, limited to 250 copies) and a Nude & Naughty Set (of 3 books, limited to 350 copies), by Christian Zanier. And for the erotic art collectors, there is the Wraparound Nude by Andrade, Bad Girl Nude by Zanier, Enforcer Nude by Adrian, Sacrilege Nude by Caceres, and Stunning Nude by Martin. We top it off with Adult covers - Century Adult Cover (limited to 100 copies) by Patrick Fillion, Stunning Adult and Adult Extreme Covers by Martin, and the C and D covers to the Six Sins Adult Cover Set by Zanier (this will be a set of six, two offered on each issue).
